titles.title: A bill to designate a rest area on the Mount Vernon Trail as the "Peter B. Webster III Memorial Area".
A bill to designate a rest area on the Mount Vernon Trail as the "Peter B. Webster III Memorial Area".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill designates the rest area bound by Alexandria Avenue, West Boulevard Drive, and the George Washington Memorial Parkway on the Mount Vernon Trail within the parkway as the "Peter B. Webster III Memorial Area."
